kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=foodie, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/restaurants path_url=/api/v1/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '114', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "FastFood_3GY6N", "category": "FastFood", "location": "Hyderabad", "images": [], "contact": "9999999999"}'

POST Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/restaurants status=201, reason=CREATED headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.1.5 Python/3.11.4', 'Date': 'Fri, 20 Feb 2026 10:36:59 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '157', 'Connection': 'close'} body={ "category": "FastFood", "contact": "9999999999", "enabled": true, "id": 1, "images": [], "location": "Hyderabad", "name": "FastFood_3GY6N" }
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
